A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m not one of those overly dramatic\, hardcore Star Wars fans proclaiming this movie to be the end of the world. It isn’t terrible\, but it isn’t too good either. I’ve been watching Star Wars movies since I was little\, but this was the first one that really felt “off” to me. The prequels had their fair share of problems\, but they still felt like Star Wars movies. Its almost as if Rian Johnson misunderstands what Star Wars is supposed to be\, and what it means to people. On top of that\, there were numerous plot holes and pointless character arcs (which were in my opinion the result of sloppy writing). In short\, this movie was disappointing. And that’s coming from someone who truly\, genuinely wanted to love it.
